05/12/2019 15:30 - +55 85 9930-8846: QFT is an interferon-gamma (IFN-Î³) release assay
05/12/2019 15:31 - +55 85 9930-8846: What is QuantiFERON-TB Gold?

QuantiFERON-TB Gold (QFT) is a simple blood test that aids in the detection of Mycobacterium tuberculosis, the bacteria which causes tuberculosis (TB). QFT is an interferon-gamma (IFN-Î³) release assay, commonly known as an IGRA, and is a modern alternative to the tuberculin skin test (TST, PPD or Mantoux). Unlike the TST, QFT is a controlled laboratory test that requires only one patient visit and is unaffected by previous Bacille Calmette-Guerin (BCG) vaccination.
